pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video presents a festive night scene on a street corner in Paris, identifiable by the street signs and architecture. A brightly lit Christmas tree stands on the left, while an ornate building on the right is adorned with a large, golden sunburst decoration. The scene is captured using a long-exposure technique, which blurs the movement of traffic into vibrant light trails.
